keywords.value: HALPERIN, ARLENE "SUNNY." MY BELOVED SISTER AND AUNT PASSED AWAY PEACEFULLY ON JANUARY 31
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: HALPERIN--Arlene "Sunny." My beloved sister and aunt passed away peacefully on January 31, 2016 surrounded by her cherished family. We treasure our memories of her too short life and recall the loving, caring and devoted person she was to all. We will miss her deeply. Myrna Clyman, Karen Robin, Mark and Millie Clyman 1/3
